What was Alena Schillerová's initial stance on increasing the salaries of state employees, as stated in the spring of 2021?

In the spring of 2021, Alena Schillerová stated that the path to budget consolidation lies in not valorizing, not increasing the salaries of employees in the state sector, and that only the salaries of teachers, firefighters, police officers, and so on will increase. According to this statement, what groups of state employees should not have their salaries increased?
What was the position of former Finance Minister Alena Schillerová regarding salary increases for state employees in the spring of 2021, and how did it change later that year?
